system.weapons: Co-Pilot: 3 Star Cannon Clusters (Front/Left, Front/Right, or Rear, Range 400m (4 AU), S/-/6, 3d10+10 E, Pen 10, Clip Unlimited, Reload -, Accurate, Twin-Linked)
system.specialRules: Is a Spacecraft. All Co-Pilot Weapons can be fired as one shooting weapons, at targets no more than 1 AU Apart, Roll for Hits and Damage Seperately. All Shooting attacks at this vehicle have -20 to hit. When receiving Critical Hits not as a result of Righteous Fury, halve result, rounding up. Bomb Payloads can't accurately hit small targets like individuals or vehicles, estimate damage of 6d10+10 E, Pen 12, Blast 6. Has Craft Rating of +6 and squadron size of 6 for Attack Craft Purposes. No Penalty if squadron is below Half-Strength.
